about_the_game:
Take your investigation to the next level with the "Detective Club: Missing in the Fog" DLC, an exciting expansion to continue your investigation! Delve into the heart of danger as Thomas and George continue their race to save Emily and untangle a dark conspiracy. With four brand-new locations, deeper mysteries, and more complex puzzles, this DLC offers hours of immersive gameplay that fans of the original won’t want to miss. 

The DLC expands the story with additional suspects to interrogate, more evidence to gather, and fresh twists in the plot. As you dig deeper, you’ll discover that every clue leads to new revelations and even darker secrets. Each location brings fresh challenges and discoveries!

🕵🏻‍♂️ SEARCH EMILY'S ROOM!

Emily’s love for chemistry might hold the key to solving the murders. Investigate her room, examine her molecule models and ant farm, and solve mini-games to discover critical information for your investigation!

🕵🏻‍♂️ EXPLORE WHITECHAPEL’S LAB!

The last place Emily was seen is brimming with chemical equipment and hidden dangers. Recreate formulas, use the reagents carefully, and uncover the experiments that might link to the conspiracy. But beware—handling reagents can be tricky!

🕵🏻‍♂️ EXAMINE THE SHIPWRECK MODEL!

Is this the same ship that sank years ago? Examine a scale model of a long-lost ship, search the captain’s quarters for hidden compartments, and piece together the ship’s connection to the overarching mystery.

🕵🏻‍♂️ FIND LEWIS!

The gang's secret pathways hide more than rats. Search every corner, discover hidden passages, and gather clues that might lead you to Lewis and the answers you need!

Enjoy challenging new puzzles designed to test your logic and observation skills. Whether it’s combining chemical elements, unlocking hidden compartments, or solving intricate riddles, the DLC brings a wealth of engaging gameplay!
